I'm Gui. I've 23 years old and i live in a small city in Portugal.
I write software code and try to hack it.
Most of my work is done on servers but i also work with clientside solutions.


As you may notice i'm not a designer.
This site is under development (available at github), not even beta. Only matters the content.
